pullrequest.title: Update physics state even when paused (not stepping)

content.raw:
I'm inclined to remove that `if`. It will have a small performance impact, but it should only affect paused mode, which is not what users usually care about in terms of performance. And also it's the time when other plugins are idling, so I think we can afford the extra computation.

I went ahead and committed that directly to this branch. Ready to approve if CI is green.

Please speak up if there are other concerns.
